mapper.update:
update t_coach
instid = #{instid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inscode = #{inscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coachnum = #{coachnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fingerprint = #{fingerprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo_url = #{photo_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fingerprint_url = #{fingerprint_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drilicence = #{drilicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fstdrilicdate = #{fstdrilicdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupationno = #{occupationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupationlevel = #{occupationlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dripermitted = #{dripermitted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teachpermitted = #{teachpermitted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employstatus = #{employstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leavedate = #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trainareaid = #{trainareaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
studentload = #{studentload,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teachtypeid = #{teachtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobid = #{jobid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teachstate = #{teachstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate = #{operate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
errorcode = #{errorcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cuid = #{cuid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
muid = #{muid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
teachStartDate = #{teachStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workType = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teaching = #{teaching,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driving = #{driving,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expireDate = #{expireDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mainstoreid = #{mainstoreid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
headcoachid = #{headcoachid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teachcartype = #{teachcartype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
headcoachflag = #{headcoachflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where coachid = #{coachid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_coach set instid = #{instid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inscode = #{inscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coachnum = #{coachnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fingerprint = #{fingerprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_url = #{photo_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fingerprint_url = #{fingerprint_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drilicence = #{drilicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fstdrilicdate = #{fstdrilicdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupationno = #{occupationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupationlevel = #{occupationlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dripermitted = #{dripermitted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teachpermitted = #{teachpermitted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employstatus = #{employstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leavedate = #{leavedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trainareaid = #{trainareaid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operate = #{operate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, errorcode = #{errorcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cuid = #{cuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, muid = #{muid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where coachid = #{coachid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT stud.studentid,stud.name,stud.sex,stud.phone,stud.cardtype,stud.idcard,stud.traintype,stud.applydate,stud.applyexam,co.coachid,cm.classid, co.name AS coachName,cm.classname AS className ,pd.proxyName,sa.scopeName,ts.storename FROM (SELECT * FROM t_student stu WHERE stu.studentid NOT IN (SELECT cs.studentId FROM t_coach_student cs WHERE cs.coachId = #{coachid}) ) AS stud LEFT JOIN t_coach_student AS tcs ON stud.studentid = tcs.studentId LEFT JOIN t_coach AS co ON co.coachid = tcs.coachId LEFT JOIN t_class_manage cm ON cm.classid = stud.classid LEFT JOIN t_proxy_dealer pd ON pd.proxyId = stud.proxyid LEFT JOIN t_scope_area sa ON sa.scopeId = stud.scopeid LEFT JOIN t_store ts ON ts.storeid = stud.storeid WHERE 1=1

SELECT stud.studentid,stud.name,stud.sex,stud.phone,stud.cardtype,stud.idcard,stud.traintype,stud.applydate, co.coachid,co.name AS coachName, cs.studentId,tcs.coachId , cm.classname AS className ,pd.proxyName,sa.scopeName,ts.storename FROM (SELECT * FROM t_coach_student WHERE coachId=#{coachid}) AS cs LEFT JOIN t_coach_student tcs ON tcs.studentId = cs.studentId LEFT JOIN t_student stud ON stud.studentid = cs.studentId LEFT JOIN t_coach co ON co.coachid = tcs.coachId LEFT JOIN t_proxy_dealer pd ON pd.proxyId = stud.proxyid LEFT JOIN t_scope_area sa ON sa.scopeId = stud.scopeid LEFT JOIN t_store ts ON ts.storeid = stud.storeid LEFT JOIN t_class_manage cm ON cm.classid = stud.classid ORDER BY cs.studentId
